      • checkRegistrationForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String checkRegistrationForm(@ModelAttribute(value="wannabeuser")
                                                                                                        WannabeUser wannabeuser,
                                                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        The filled WannabeUser-object is tested here on invalidity. If it is invalid an Array of Errors is returned and you get Error-messages at the View. But if is is Valid a new RegistredUser-object is saved to the Database and you get redirected to the Login-page.
        Parameters:
        wannabeuser -
        bindingResult -
        Returns:
